DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy IDP-107 versus placebo treat patient acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Ranging Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy IDP-107 Patients With Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Presence acne vulgaris face neck/trunk Presence inflammatory noninflammatory lesion face Presence skin condition face could interfere clinical evaluation Use systemic antibiotic corticosteroid within 4 week prior Baseline visit Use systemic retinoids , isotretinoin , within 3 month prior Baseline visit Woman pregnant , nurse infant , plan pregnancy study period
